code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import ReactMarkdown from"react-markdown";import remarkMath from"remark-math";import rehypeKatex from"rehype-katex";import{Box,Typography}from"@mui/material";import"katex/dist/katex.min.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MarkdownViewer=_ref=>{let{filePath}=_ref;const[markdownContent,setMarkdownContent]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const loadMarkdown=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(filePath);setMarkdownContent(response.data);}catch(error){setMarkdownContent("无法加载指定的 Markdown 文件。");console.error(error);}};if(filePath){loadMarkdown();}},[filePath]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{p:4,maxWidth:"800px",margin:"0 auto"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{border:"1px solid #ccc",borderRadius:"8px",p:2},children:markdownContent?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactMarkdown,{children:markdownContent,remarkPlugins:[remarkMath],rehypePlugins:[rehypeKatex],components:{h1:_ref2=>{let{node,...props}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,sx:{fontSize:"1.5rem",fontWeight:"bold"},...props});},h2:_ref3=>{let{node,...props}=_ref3;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,sx:{fontSize:"1.25rem",fontWeight:600},...props});},h3:_ref4=>{let{node,...props}=_ref4;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",gutterBottom:true,sx:{fontSize:"1.1rem",fontWeight:600},...props});},p:_ref5=>{let{node,...props}=_ref5;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",gutterBottom:true,sx:{fontSize:"0.95rem"},...props});},li:_ref6=>{let{node,...props}=_ref6;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"li",variant:"body2",gutterBottom:true,sx:{fontSize:"0.95rem"},...props});}}}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"textSecondary",children:"\u6B63\u5728\u52A0\u8F7D\u5185\u5BB9..."})})});};export default MarkdownViewer;
